rings.name: The One Ring
rings.creator: Sauron
rings.description: The most powerful of all the Rings of Power, capable of controlling other rings and corrupting its bearer.

features.name: Power Over Other Rings
features.description: Can control and dominate the other Rings of Power and their bearers.

features.name: Corruption
features.description: Has the ability to corrupt and dominate the will of those who possess it.

rings.background_story: Forged by Sauron in the fires of Mount Doom, the One Ring holds immense power and the ability to control the other Rings of Power. Its creation was a key part of Sauron's plan to dominate Middle-earth.

appearance.description: The One Ring is a simple gold band, but its true power is revealed when its inscription is visible in the fires of Mount Doom.

rings.name: The Three Elven Rings
rings.creator: Celebrimbor
rings.description: Three powerful rings given to the Elves, which were not touched by Sauron and are used to preserve and protect their realms.

features.name: Preservation
features.description: These rings help preserve the beauty and tranquility of the Elven realms.

features.name: Invisibility to Sauron
features.description: They are not affected by Sauron's direct influence as they were not forged by him.

rings.background_story: The Three Elven Rings were forged by Celebrimbor and given to the Elves to protect and preserve their realms. They were not tainted by Sauron's influence due to their creation independent of the Dark Lord.

appearance.description: Each of the Three Rings is unique, with intricate Elven designs and a subtle glow that reflects their purity and power.

rings.name: The Seven Dwarf Rings
rings.creator: Sauron
rings.description: Seven rings given to the Dwarf Lords, which amplified their greed for gold and treasures.

features.name: Greed Amplification
features.description: The rings increased the holders' greed and desire for wealth.

features.name: Dwarf Power
features.description: Enhanced the strength and abilities of Dwarf Lords.

rings.background_story: The Seven Rings were given to the Dwarf Lords by Sauron to corrupt them and increase their greed for gold. Though not all Dwarves fell to the corruption, the rings still amplified their desire for wealth.

appearance.description: The Seven Rings are designed with Dwarven craftsmanship, often adorned with precious stones and symbols of wealth.

rings.name: The Nine Rings for Men
rings.creator: Sauron
rings.description: Nine rings given to human kings and lords, turning them into the Nazgûl or Ringwraiths.

features.name: Transformation into Nazgûl
features.description: The rings turned their bearers into wraiths, bound to Sauron.

features.name: Enhanced Power
features.description: Gave great power to their human bearers, at the cost of their humanity.

rings.background_story: The Nine Rings were given to human kings and lords by Sauron to dominate and corrupt them. Over time, these bearers became the Nazgûl, wraith-like servants bound to the Dark Lord.

appearance.description: The Nine Rings are often unremarkable in appearance, but their bearers become wraith-like beings with dark, shadowy forms.
